title: rdana
author: rdana
content: Can anybody suggest a good liquidity provider for this pair (KZT-USDT)

comments.author: albon
comments.body: Quote from: rdana on September 27, 2023, 03:22:03 PMCan anybody suggest a good liquidity provider for this pair (KZT-USDT) If you are referring to a liquidity provider for the Kazakhstani Tenge currency in exchange for the USDT stablecoin, I recommend the Binance platform and the OKX platform to you. They have good liquidity and provide many payment methods in the P2P feature. In addition, the fees are zero on these two platforms, and they have fast customer service ready to answer your inquiries or any problems that you face; all you need is to create an account on one of these exchange platforms and protect your account with 2FA and all other methods of security and then submit your documents and the necessary requirements to pass KYC.Do your research to choose the exchange platform that best suits your needs, and I recommend reading the following two articles: [ Secure P2P Trading: + Don't Fall Victim to Proof of Payment Scams ]Sources:[1] https://p2p.binance.com/en/trade/all-payments/USDT?fiat=KZT[2] https://www.okx.com/p2p-markets/kzt/buy-usdt

comments.author: kizlod
comments.body: I would check bestchange if I were you. It's an aggregator that will provide you with hundreds of options, you can choose whatever you like.

comments.author: rdana
comments.body: Thanks gents.Yes essentially I would want a large liquidity provider that can give us a single rate based on the market rate.Binance and P2P are good but the individuals dont have enough single point of liquidity for us to swap/exchange. So it would be good to even partner with a group that has that sum of KZT to USDT

comments.author: zasad@
comments.body: Quote from: rdana on September 28, 2023, 07:35:50 AMThanks gents.Yes essentially I would want a large liquidity provider that can give us a single rate based on the market rate.Binance and P2P are good but the individuals dont have enough single point of liquidity for us to swap/exchange. So it would be good to even partner with a group that has that sum of KZT to USDTThere are a lot of large exchangers on BestChange, but first you will have to get acquainted. Large exchanges are not done the first time.Next, I advise you to contact Apytioh. He is from Kazakhstan and he worked in a large Kazakhstani cryptocurrency exchange. Maybe he can help you. Here is his interview.[Interview] Crypto business in Kazakhstanhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5313966

comments.author: rdana
comments.body: Would you be able to contact him on my behalf and get him to send me a message. Im a newbie and he doesnt allow newbies to contact him.

comments.body: Quote from: rdana on September 28, 2023, 10:14:23 AMWould you be able to contact him on my behalf and get him to send me a message. Im a newbie and he doesnt allow newbies to contact him.I sent him a private message.
